body_html:
Hi @wddabc, I'm having the same problem as you. What did you put in your $LD_LIBRARY_PATH to make this work? And did you come up with a good solution?

My LD_LIBRARY_PATH currently echoes

/home/chris/geant4.10.04-install/lib:/usr/local/root/lib:/usr/local/bin/Delphes-3.3.3:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/root/lib:/home/chris/geant4.10.04

Best,
Michael

body:
Hi @wddabc, I'm having the same problem as you. What did you put in your $LD_LIBRARY_PATH to make this work? And did you come up with a good solution?

My LD_LIBRARY_PATH currently echoes

 /home/chris/geant4.10.04-install/lib:/usr/local/root/lib:/usr/local/bin/Delphes-3.3.3:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/root/lib:/home/chris/geant4.10.04



Best,
Michael
